content: 2 half_double_crochet in same st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts * 2 half_double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts repeat from * to end join to 1st half_double_crochet 32 3½ r5 chain 1 work 2 half_double_crochet in same st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts * 2 half_double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts repeat from * to end join to 1st half_double_crochet 40 4½ r6 accent chain 1 work 2 single_crochet in same st 1 single_crochet in each of the next 4 sts * 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in each of the next 4 sts repeat from * to end join to 1st single_crochet 48 5 r7 chain 1 work 2 half_double_crochet in same st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts * 2 half_double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts repeat from * to end work 1 more half_double_crochet in last st join to 1st half_double_crochet 57 6 r8 chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in same st 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next st * 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next st repeat from * one time work 1 half_double_crochet in each of the last 2 sts join to 1st single_crochet 60 r8 for the visual crocheter -
